getById.description: Gets a employees with corresponding primary key

create.sql: INSERT INTO employees(email, password, departmentId, bossId, firstName, lastName, salary) VALUES ($email, $password, $departmentId, $bossId, $firstName, $lastName, $salary)

update.sql: UPDATE employees SET email = $email, password = $password, departmentId = $departmentId, bossId = $bossId, firstName = $firstName, lastName = $lastName, salary = $salary WHERE employeeId = $employeeId
update.description: updates an existing employees with corresponding primary key

delete.description: deletes an existing employees with corresponding primary key
